welcome_message_body: Welcome to Delta, Canada! We're known for our beautiful natural landscapes, charming small towns, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Daveto's
restaurants.description: Daveto's is a italian restaurant located in Delta.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coal Harbour Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Floatplane Terminal
terminals.description: The floatplane terminal at Coal Harbour Airport serves regional flights and scenic tours.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miners Bay Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Springbank Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Springbank Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orcas Island Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Orcas Island Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
